article_node.title: For Two or Three Days, a Surfer’s Paradise in New York City
article_node.summary: On a chilly and misty Thursday morning, surfers on Long Island experienced an unexpected thrill as Hurricane Erin brought in impressive eight-foot waves, creating ideal conditions for surfing. Despite the summer weather, dedicated surfers donned neoprene suits to catch some of the best waves of the season, showcasing their passion for the sport even in less than perfect conditions.
